title: Haven't met any north indians in orientation and hostel
content: This isn't intended to hurt anyone but I would like to know about the north indians in the campus joining this year because the people in my hostel too are from Bangalore. I thought that pes is a well known college so many people from north might be here and also because I did read many north indians posting here in a last few weeks. Did you guys go extinct?

comments.body: we're here only, we jus blend in v well with our southie homies
Kaise blend kar rahe ho bata do. Yahan toh sab aapas mein kannada mein baat kar rahe hain. Left out feel ho raha bc
Majority of the students converse in English
Thik hai. But koi hai ki nhi north ka. Koi mil hi nhi raha hai.
Bahaha konsa campus hai? Rr Mai northiss bhare hai hamara gang dhundo
Hain sachi? Bata do Bhai kaun ho tum aur tumhara gang
No wonder, nbx Mai thodi Kam hai, mostly mess block and it block Mai hai, mostly non engineering hai, but bohot sare engineering bhi mile hai
